resources.string: When screen is off and the smart action is opened, double-click the touch area to open the camera
Double-click the touch area to open the camera, if the screen is off,you should open the smart action in advance
Click the touch area to take photos
In the camera viewfinder interface, click touch area to take photos
Long press the touch area to switch camera
In the camera viewfinder interface, long press the touch area to switch camera
When an incoming call, double-click the touch area to answer the call
When screen is off, double-click to open the camera touch area.
